info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Transylvania, northwestern Pickens and northeastern Oconee Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 416 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Brevard to 9 miles north of Walhalla. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pickens, Six Mile, Salem, Lake Keowee, Jocassee Gorges, Lake Jocassee, Devils Fork State Park, Gorges State Park, Keowee Toxaway State Park and Table Rock State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
